definition: to show understanding/to excuse/to presume/to expect

sentences.english: The Bible tells us to forgive our enemies; not our friends. – Margot Asquith.
sentences.chinese: 聖經告訴我原諒我們的敵人，但沒說要原諒朋友。

sentences.english: The Bible tells us to forgive our enemies; not our friends. – Margot Asquith.
sentences.chinese: 聖經告訴我原諒我們的敵人，但沒說要原諒朋友。

sentences.english: Could you excuse me this time?
sentences.chinese: 這一次就原諒我吧，行不行？

sentences.english: Please forgive me for opening your letter by mistake.
God  making contact withs to forgive you.
I beg your pardon , " said Alice very humbly."
But Andrew forgave her completely with charity.
sentences.chinese: 但安得魯因仁慈而完全原諒了她。

sentences.english: Pardon me, hounded hope, for laughing from time to time.
sentences.chinese: 被追獵的希望啊，原諒我不時大笑。

sentences.english: You forgive me for being so pathetic.
May your eminence forgive me for this crude answer.
sentences.chinese: 請上座原諒我粗率的回答。

sentences.english: One day, his aunt came to beg for forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 一日，密勒日巴的姑母前來祈求原諒。

sentences.english: I pardon you, but you will never do it again.
sentences.chinese: 我原諒您，但是不能再這樣幹了。

sentences.english: And I hope you can forgive me.
I acquit Edward of all essential misconduct.
sentences.chinese: 我原諒愛德華的所有根本過錯。

sentences.english: Some people can be forgiven because of what they do even though they are unpunctual.
sentences.chinese: 一些人因爲他們的工作可以被原諒，即便他們遲到。

sentences.english: Tao says, but won't forgive peng cdfis forgive her.
sentences.chinese: 道說農會原諒彭，但是不會原諒她。

definition: unworthy/to let down/I'm sorry/excuse me/pardon me/if you please/sorry? (please repeat)
to let off/to let slip by/to let sb get away with sth
to press charges/to file a complaint
to admit/to concede/to recognize/recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc)/to acknowledge
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
